text: Yılmaz Erdoğan (born 4 November 1967 in Hakkâri, Turkey) is a Turkish actor and filmmaker.biography of Yılmaz Erdoğan He is most famous for the movie Vizontele and the television series Bir Demet Tiyatro in Turkey. He has also won the Australian film award for Best Supporting Actor.Australian film award goes to Yılmaz Erdoğanhttp://www.biletix.com/etkinlik- grup/119213105/TURKIYE/en ==Filmography== *Vizontele Director, Writer and Actor *Bir Demet Tiyatro Writer and Actor *Vizontele Tuuba Director, Writer and Actor *Magic Carpet Ride Director, Writer and Actor *Bir Demet Tiyatro Writer and Actor *Jolly Life Director, Writer and Actor *Eyyvah Eyvah Producer *Once Upon a Time in Anatolia Actor ==References== * Category:Living people Category:1967 births Category:Turkish businesspeople Category:Turkish actors
title: Yılmaz Erdoğan
